description:
http://anidb.net/ch39363 [Hajime]`s mother. She has two children, http://anidb.net/ch39370 [Futaba] (an elementary-schooler) and, of course, Hajime (a middle schooler). She`s a young mother, and currently takes care of the kids and the house while her husband is away. Casual and easygoing, Kyoko`s pretty laid back when it comes to the kids doing their schoolwork, but she`s very strict about their manners. Kyoko is a woman of many skills; not only is she good at running the Murata household, but she plays a mean game of Bam Bam Sumo Tournament, too.
Source: shingu.rightstuf.com
name: Murata Kyouko
